title: Asking about office amenities
context: Ask the community manager where the free coffee or printer is located.

neutral.text: Can you show me the printer?
Where can I find the break room?
Is there a copier I can use?
Can you tell me about the office amenities?
Where is the free coffee located?

informal.text: Got a printer I can use?
What's the deal with the break room?
Where's the best place to grab a cup of coffee?
Can you point me to the copier?
Where do you guys keep the office supplies?
What kind of amenities do you have here?
Is there a fridge I can use?

formal.text: Could you please direct me to the coffee machine?
I would like to know where the printer is located.
What office amenities are available to me?
Could you show me where the break room is?
I would appreciate it if you could tell me about the office supplies.
Where can I find the copier and other office equipment?

options: tell me about the office supplies
direct me to the coffee machine

dialogs.description: Asking the community manager about office amenities

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hi, where is the free coffee?

lines.speaker: Community Manager
lines.text: The coffee machine is in the break room, down the hall to your left.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Excuse me, where can I find the printer?

lines.speaker: Community Manager
lines.text: The printer is in the office supply room, next to the copier.
